trans-unit.source: If the value is true, Non-standard capability codes are used during capability negotiation. If the value is false, RFC-defined standard ORF capability codes are used during capability negotiation.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则在能力协商期间使用非标准能力代码。如果值为false,则在能力协商期间使用RFC定义的标准ORF能力代码。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, VPN BGP instances are enabled to automatically select router IDs. If the value is false, VPN BGP instances are disabled from automatically selecting router IDs.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则启用VPN BGP实例自动选择路由器ID。如果该值为假,则禁止VPN BGP实例自动选择路由器ID。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, VPN-Target filtering function is performed for received VPN routes. If the value is false, VPN-Target filtering function is not performed for received VPN routes.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为真,则对接收到的VPN路由执行VPN-目标过滤功能,如果值为假,则对接收到的VPN路由不执行VPN-目标过滤功能。如果值为false,则对收到的VPN路由不执行VPN-目标过滤功能。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, When the vpnv4 multicast neighbor receives and updates the message, the message has no label. If the value is false, When the vpnv4 multicast neighbor receives and updates the message, the message has label.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为真,当vpnv4组播邻居收到并更新消息时,消息没有标签,如果值为假,当vpnv4组播邻居收到并更新消息时,消息有标签。如果为假,当vpnv4组播邻居收到并更新消息时,消息有标签。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, advertised ARP routes are distinguished. If the value is false, advertised ARP routes are not distinguished.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则公告的ARP路由被区分。如果值为false,则不区分宣传的ARP路由。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, advertised IRB routes are distinguished. If the value is false, advertised IRB routes are not distinguished.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则公告的IRB路由被区分。如果值为false,则不区分宣传的IRB路由。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, after the fast EBGP interface awareness function is enabled, EBGP sessions on an interface are deleted immediately when the interface goes Down. If the value is false, after the fast EBGP interface awareness function is enabled, EBGP sessions on an interface are not deleted immediately when the interface goes Down.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为真,启用快速EBGP接口感知功能后,当接口宕机时,接口上的EBGP会话立即被删除。如果该值为假,在启用快速EBGP接口感知功能后,当接口Down时,接口上的EBGP会话不会被立即删除。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, automatic aggregation is enabled for locally imported routes. If the value is false, automatic aggregation is disabled for locally imported routes.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为真,则启用本地导入路由的自动聚合功能,如果值为假,则禁用本地导入路由的自动聚合功能。如果值为false,则禁用本地导入的路由的自动聚合。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, enable reduce priority to advertise route. If the value is false, disable reduce priority to advertise route.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则启用降低优先级来发布路由广告。如果为假,则禁用降低优先级来发布路由广告。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, enable vpls-ad. If the value is false, disable vpls-ad.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为真,则启用vpls-ad。如果值为假,则禁用vpls-ad。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, importing default routes to the BGP routing table is allowed. If the value is false, importing default routes to the BGP routing table is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为真,则允许将默认路由导入到BGP路由表中。如果值为false,则不允许将默认路由导入到BGP路由表中。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, modifying extended community attributes is allowed. If the value is false, modifying extended community attributes is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为真,则允许修改扩展的社区属性,如果值为假,则不允许修改扩展的社区属性。如果值为false,则不允许修改扩展社区属性。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, peer create MPLS Local IFNET disable. If the value is false, peer create MPLS Local IFNET enable.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则对等体创建MPLS本地IFNET禁用。如果值为false,对等体创建MPLS本地IFNET启用。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, peers are enabled to inherit the BFD function from the peer group. If the value is false, peers are disabled to inherit the BFD function from the peer group.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则启用对等体从对等体组继承BFD功能。如果该值为假,则禁用对等体从对等体组继承BFD功能。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, relay delay enable. If the value is false, relay delay disable.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则启用继电器延迟。如果为假,则禁用继电器延时。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, repetitive local AS numbers are allowed. If the value is false, repetitive local AS numbers are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则允许重复的本地AS号。如果值为false,则不允许重复的本地AS号。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, route reflection is enabled between clients. If the value is false, route reflection is disabled between clients.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则在客户端之间启用路由反射。如果值为false,则在客户端之间禁用路由反射。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, sent BGP update messages carry only the public AS number but do not carry private AS numbers. If the value is false, sent BGP update messages can carry private AS numbers.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则发送的BGP更新报文只携带公有AS号,不携带私有AS号。如果值为假,发送的BGP更新报文可以携带私有AS号。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, the AS path attribute is ignored when BGP selects an optimal route. If the value is false, the AS path attribute is not ignored when BGP selects an optimal route. An AS path with a smaller length has a higher priority.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则在BGP选择最优路由时忽略AS路径属性。如果值为false,则BGP选择最优路由时,不会忽略AS路径属性。长度较小的AS路径具有较高的优先级。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, the EBGP peer can use either a fake AS number or the actual AS number. If the value is false, the EBGP peer can only use a fake AS number.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,EBGP对等体可以使用假的AS号或实际的AS号。如果该值为假,EBGP对等体只能使用假的AS号。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, the MEDs of routes learned from peers in different autonomous systems are compared when BGP selects an optimal route. If the value is false, the MEDs of routes learned from peers in different autonomous systems are not compared when BGP selects an optimal route.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则在BGP选择最优路由时,会比较从不同自治系统的对等体学到的路由的MED值。如果该值为假,则在BGP选择最优路由时,不比较从不同自治系统中的对等体学到的路由的MED值。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, the address prefix-based Outbound Route Filter (ORF) capability is enabled for peers. If the value is false, the address prefix-based Outbound Route Filter (ORF) capability is disabled for peers.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则为对等体启用基于地址前缀的出站路由过滤器(ORF)功能。如果该值为假,则会为对等体禁用基于地址前缀的出站路由过滤器(ORF)功能。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, the community attribute is advertised to peers. If the value is false, the community attribute is not advertised to peers.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为真,则向对等体宣传社区属性。如果值为false,则不向对等体宣传社区属性。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, the efficiency policy is active in this cluster. If the value is false this policy will not be activated by the schedulers and hence will be inactive.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则效率策略在这个集群中是活跃的。如果该值为假,则该策略不会被调度器激活,因此将不活跃。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, the extended community attribute in the peer route information is discarded. If the value is false, the extended community attribute in the peer route information is not discarded.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为真,则丢弃对等体路由信息中的扩展社区属性。如果值为假,则不丢弃对等体路由信息中的扩展社区属性。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, the extended community attribute is advertised to peers. If the value is false, the extended community attribute is not advertised to peers.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为真,则向对等体宣传扩展的社区属性。如果值为false,则不向对等体宣传扩展的社区属性。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, the function to advertise default routes to peers is enabled. If the value is false, the function to advertise default routes to peers is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为真,则启用向对等体公布默认路由的功能。如果值为false,则禁用向对等体宣传默认路由的功能。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, the function to advertise supernetwork label is enabled. If the value is false, the function to advertise supernetwork label is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为真,则启用超级网络标签广告的功能,如果值为假,则禁用超级网络标签广告的功能。如果值为false,则禁用超级网络标签广告功能。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, the function to advertise supernetwork unicast routes is enabled. If the value is false, the function to advertise supernetwork unicast routes is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则启用超级网络单播路由的广告功能。如果值为false,则禁用超级网络单播路由的广告功能。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, the function to replace a specified peer's AS number in the AS-Path attribute with the local AS number is enabled. If the value is false, the function to replace a specified peer's AS number in the AS-Path attribute with the local AS number is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为真,则启用用本地AS号替换AS-Path属性中指定对等体的AS号的功能。如果该值为false,则禁用将AS-Path属性中指定对等体的AS号替换为本地AS号的功能。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, the local device functions as the route reflector and a peer functions as a client of the route reflector. If the value is false, the route reflector and client functions are not configured.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则本地设备作为路由反射器,对等设备作为路由反射器的客户端。如果值为假,则不配置路由反射器和客户端功能。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, the metrics of next-hop IGP routes are not compared when BGP selects an optimal route. If the value is false, the metrics of next-hop IGP routes are not compared when BGP selects an optimal route. A route with a smaller metric has a higher priority.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则BGP选择最优路由时,不比较下一跳IGP路由的度量。如果值为假,则BGP选择最优路由时,不比较下一跳IGP路由的度量。公制值较小的路由优先级较高,如果公制值为false,则BGP选择最优路由时不比较下一跳IGP路由的公制值。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, the next hop of an advertised route is changed to the advertiser itself in BGP load-balancing scenarios. If the value is false, the next hop of an advertised route is not changed to the advertiser itself in BGP load-balancing scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则在BGP负载均衡场景下,广告路由的下一跳会被更改为广告主本身。如果该值为假,则在BGP负载均衡场景中,广告路由的下一跳不会更改为广告商本身。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, the next hop of an advertised route is changed to the advertiser itself in EBGP load-balancing scenarios. If the value is false, the next hop of an advertised route is not changed to the advertiser itself in EBGP load-balancing scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则在EBGP负载均衡场景下,广告路由的下一跳会改为广告主本身。如果该值为假,则在EBGP负载均衡场景中,广告路由的下一跳不会更改为广告主本身。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, the next hop of an advertised route is changed to the advertiser itself in IBGP load-balancing scenarios. If the value is false, the next hop of an advertised route is not changed to the advertiser itself in IBGP load-balancing scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则在IBGP负载均衡场景中,广告路由的下一跳将被更改为广告主本身。如果该值为false,则在IBGP负载均衡场景中,广告路由的下一跳不会更改为广告主本身。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, the remote next-hop attribute is advertised to peers. If the value is false, the remote next-hop attribute is not advertised to any peers.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为真,远程下一跳属性就会向对等体发布广告。如果值为false,远程下一跳属性不对任何对等体做广告。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, the route reflector is enabled to modify route path attributes based on an export policy. If the value is false, the route reflector is disabled from modifying route path attributes based on an export policy.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则启用路由反射器,可以根据出口策略修改路由路径属性,如果该值为假,则禁止路由反射器根据出口策略修改路由路径属性。如果值为false,则禁止路径反射器根据出口策略修改路径属性。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, the router ID attribute is ignored when BGP selects the optimal route. If the value is false, the router ID attribute is not ignored when BGP selects the optimal route.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则在BGP选择最佳路由时忽略路由器ID属性。如果值为false,则在BGP选择最佳路由时不会忽略路由器ID属性。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, the router has all extended capabilities. If the value is false, the router does not have all extended capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则说明路由器具有所有的扩展功能。如果值为false,则路由器不具备所有扩展能力。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, the session with a specified peer is torn down and all related routing entries are cleared. If the value is false, the session with a specified peer is retained.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则与指定对等体的会话被撕毁,所有相关的路由条目被清除。如果该值为假,则保留与指定对等体的会话。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, the system is enabled to preferentially use the single-hop mode for BFD session setup between IBGP peers. If the value is false, the system is disabled from preferentially using the single-hop mode for BFD session setup between IBGP peers.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则系统启用优先使用单跳模式在IBGP对等体之间进行BFD会话设置。如果该值为假,则系统被禁止在IBGP对等体之间优先使用单跳模式进行BFD会话设置。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, the system stores all route update messages received from all peers (groups) after BGP connection setup. If the value is false, the system stores only BGP update messages that are received from peers and pass the configured import policy.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,系统将存储BGP连接设置后从所有对等体(组)接收到的所有路由更新消息。如果该值为假,系统只存储从对等体接收到并通过配置的导入策略的BGP更新消息。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, the third-party next hop function is enabled. If the value is false, the third-party next hop function is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则启用第三方下一跳功能。如果该值为假,则禁用第三方下一跳功能。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, vpls enable. If the value is false, vpls disable.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则启用vpls。如果值为false,则vpls禁用。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, when BGP selects an optimal route, the system uses 4294967295 as the MED value of a route if the route's attribute does not carry a MED value. If the value is false, the system uses 0 as the MED value of a route if the route's attribute does not carry a MED value.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,当BGP选择最优路由时,如果路由的属性不携带MED值,系统会使用4294967295作为路由的MED值。如果该值为假,则如果路由的属性不携带MED值,则系统使用0作为路由的MED值。

trans-unit.source: If the value of async: is not high enough, this will cause the “check on it later” task to fail because the temporary status file that the async_status: is looking for will not have been written or no longer exist
trans-unit.target: 如果 async: 的值不够高，这将导致“稍后检查”任务失败，因为 async_status: 正在寻找的临时状态文件将不会被写入或不再存在

trans-unit.source: If the value of content option is in xml format in that case the xml value should have config as root tag.
trans-unit.target: 如果 content 选项的值是xml格式，则xml值应具有config作为root标记。

trans-unit.source: If the value of format options is not given it tries to guess the data format of content option as one of xml or json or text.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供 format 选项的值，它将尝试猜测 content 选项的数据格式为xml或json或text之一。

trans-unit.source: If the value of compression is greater than 0, new connections to that server will use compression. If omitted the proxysql database default for compression is 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果压缩值大于0，则到该服务器的新连接将使用压缩。如果省略，则用于压缩的proxysql数据库默认值为0。

trans-unit.source: If the value of a timer changes, the BGP peer relationship between the routers is disconnected. The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 21845. The default value is 60.
trans-unit.target: 如果定时器的值发生变化,路由器之间的BGP对等关系就会断开。该值是一个整数,范围从0到21845。默认值为60。

trans-unit.source: If the value provided for a key is not set and state=absent, the tag will be removed regardless of its current value.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置为键提供的值且state = absent，则将删除标签，而不考虑其当前值。

trans-unit.source: If the value provided for a tag is null and state is absent, the tag will be removed regardless of its current value.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了一个标签值为null和 state 是不存在的，标签将需要考虑其当前价值的去除。

trans-unit.source: If the value provided for a tag is null and state=absent, the tag will be removed regardless of its current value.
trans-unit.target: 如果为标签提供的值为null且state = absent，则无论标签的当前值如何，都将删除该标签。

trans-unit.source: If the variable used in the handler name is not available, the entire play fails. Changing that variable mid-play will not result in newly created handler.
trans-unit.target: 如果在处理程序名称中使用的变量不可用，则整个播放将失败。在播放过程中更改该变量不会导致新创建处理程序。

trans-unit.source: If the version of parted is below 3.1, it requires a Linux version running the sysfs file system /sys/.
trans-unit.target: 如果parted的版本低于3.1，则需要运行sysfs文件系统 /sys/ 的Linux版本。

trans-unit.source: If the virtual machine already exists, this parameter will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果虚拟机已经存在,这个参数将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If the vmdk file is too large to export in 10 minutes, specify the value larger than 10, the maximum value is 60.
trans-unit.target: 如果vmdk文件太大,无法在10分钟内导出,请指定大于10的值,最大值为60。

trans-unit.source: If the vmdk file is too large, you can increase the value.
trans-unit.target: 如果vmdk文件太大,可以增加数值。

trans-unit.source: If the volume is not paired, the access status is locked.
trans-unit.target: 如果该卷没有配对,则访问状态被锁定。

trans-unit.source: If the volume's most recent snapshot has started less than `last_snapshot_min_age' minutes ago, a new snapshot will not be created.
trans-unit.target: 如果卷的最新快照开始时间小于`last_snapshot_min_age'分钟前,新的快照将不会被创建。

trans-unit.source: If there are 63 ports per node, the pool size must be a multiple of 64.
trans-unit.target: 如果每个节点有63个端口,池大小必须是64的倍数。

trans-unit.source: If there are commands to run against the host
trans-unit.target: 如果有命令要针对主机运行

trans-unit.source: If there are major problems with the first candidate, a second candidate will be tagged (RC2) once the necessary fixes have landed. This second candidate lasts for a shorter duration than the first. If no problems have been reported after two business days, the final release is done.
trans-unit.target: 如果第一个候选者存在重大问题，则在必要的修复措施发布后，第二个候选者将被标记（ RC2 ）。第二个候选人的持续时间比第一个候选人的持续时间短。如果两个工作日后未报告任何问题，则完成最终发布。

trans-unit.source: If there are multiple network adapters with the same device_type, you should set label or mac to match one of them, or will apply changes on all network adapters with the device_type specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多个具有相同 device_type 的网络适​​配器，则应将 label 或 mac 设置为与它们之一匹配，或者将更改应用于指定了 device_type 的所有网络适配器。

trans-unit.source: If there are numbers in hostnames, leading zero should be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果主机名中有数字,应使用前导零。

trans-unit.source: If there are pending actions for the service monitored by monit, then Ansible will check for up to this many seconds to verify the requested action has been performed. Ansible will sleep for five seconds between each check.
trans-unit.target: 如果monit所监控的服务有待执行的操作,那么Ansible将最多检查这几秒钟,以验证所请求的操作是否已被执行。在每次检查之间,Ansible将休眠5秒。

trans-unit.source: If there are problems with local connections, using login_unix_socket=/path/to/mysqld/socket instead of login_host=localhost might help. As an example, the default MariaDB installation of version 10.4 and later uses the unix_socket authentication plugin by default that without using login_unix_socket=/var/run/mysqld/mysqld.sock (the default path) causes the error Host '127.0.0.1' is not allowed to connect to this MariaDB server.
trans-unit.target: 如果本地连接存在问题，则使用login_unix_socket = / path / to / mysqld / socket代替login_host = localhost可能会有所帮助。例如，默认情况下，版本10.4和更高版本的MariaDB安装使用unix_socket身份验证插件，即不使用login_unix_socket = / var / run / mysqld / mysqld.sock（默认路径）会导致错误 Host '127.0.0.1' is not allowed to connect to this MariaDB server 。

trans-unit.source: If there is a certificate present in path and it is an ECS certificate, tracking_id will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果路径中存在证书，并且它是ECS证书，则trace_id将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If there is a problem with the status of the node, it is reported here.
trans-unit.target: 如果节点的状态有问题,会在这里报告。

trans-unit.source: If there is a problem with the status of the node, that problem is reported here.
trans-unit.target: 如果节点的状态有问题,这里会报告这个问题。

trans-unit.source: If this field is set to "true", LUNs in the volume being restored will remain mapped and their identities preserved such that host connectivity will not be disrupted during the restore operation. Once the restore operation has completed, hosts will be able to resume I/O access to the LUNs.
trans-unit.target: 如果此字段设置为 "true",被还原的卷中的LUN将保持映射,并保留其身份,这样主机连接在还原操作期间不会中断。在还原操作期间,通过将LUN置于不可用状态,对LUN的I/O将被屏蔽。一旦还原操作完成,主机将能够恢复对LUNs的I/O访问。

trans-unit.source: If this field is set to "true", the Snapshot copy is restored even if the volume has one or more newer Snapshot copies which are currently used as reference Snapshot copy by SnapMirror. If a restore is done in this situation, this will cause future SnapMirror transfers to fail.

trans-unit.source: If using HTTPS is not an option, then HTTP can be used when the authentication option is NTLM, Kerberos or CredSSP. These protocols will encrypt the WinRM payload with their own encryption method before sending it to the server. The message-level encryption is not used when running over HTTPS because the encryption uses the more secure TLS protocol instead. If both transport and message encryption is required, set ansible_winrm_message_encryption=always in the host vars.
trans-unit.target: 如果不选择使用HTTPS，则当身份验证选项为 NTLM ， Kerberos 或 CredSSP 时可以使用HTTP 。这些协议将使用自己的加密方法对WinRM有效负载进行加密，然后再将其发送到服务器。在HTTPS上运行时不使用消息级加密，因为加密使用的是更安全的TLS协议。如果同时需要传输和消息加密，请在主机变量中 ansible_winrm_message_encryption=always 设置ansible_winrm_message_encryption = always。

trans-unit.source: If you are “chaining” additional filters after the default(omit) filter, you should instead do something like this: "{{ foo | default(None) | some_filter or omit }}". In this example, the default None (Python null) value will cause the later filters to fail, which will trigger the or omit portion of the logic. Using omit in this manner is very specific to the later filters you are chaining though, so be prepared for some trial and error if you do this.
trans-unit.target: If you are “chaining” additional filters after the default(omit) filter, you should instead do something like this: "{{ foo | default(None) | some_filter or omit }}" . In this example, the default None (Python null) value will cause the later filters to fail, which will trigger the or omit portion of the logic. Using omit in this manner is very specific to the later filters you are chaining though, so be prepared for some trial and error if you do this.

trans-unit.source: If you are “chaining” additional filters after the default(omit) filter, you should instead do something like this: "{{ foo | default(None) | some_filter or omit }}". In this example, the default None (Python null) value will cause the later filters to fail, which will trigger the or omit portion of the logic. Using omit in this manner is very specific to the later filters you’re chaining though, so be prepared for some trial and error if you do this.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在“ default(omit) 过滤器之后“链接”其他过滤器，则应改为执行以下操作： "{{ foo | default(None) | some_filter or omit }}" 。在此示例中，默认的 None （Python null）值将导致以后的过滤器失败，这将触发逻辑的 or omit 部分。但是，以这种方式使用 omit 是非常特定于您要链接的更高版本的过滤器的，因此，如果这样做，请为一些反复试验做好准备。

trans-unit.source: If you are running Ansible from within EC2, internal DNS names and IP addresses may make more sense than public DNS names. In this case, you can modify the destination_variable in ec2.ini to be the private DNS name of an instance. This is particularly important when running Ansible within a private subnet inside a VPC, where the only way to access an instance is via its private IP address. For VPC instances, vpc_destination_variable in ec2.ini provides a means of using which ever boto.ec2.instance variable makes the most sense for your use case.
trans-unit.target: 如果您从EC2内部运行Ansible，则内部DNS名称和IP地址可能比公共DNS名称更有意义。在这种情况下，您可以修改 destination_variable 在 ec2.ini 是一个实例的私有DNS名称。在VPC内的私有子网中运行Ansible时，这尤其重要，在该子网中，访问实例的唯一方法是通过其私有IP地址。对于VPC实例， vpc_destination_variable 中的 ec2.ini 提供了一种使用哪种boto.ec2.instance变量最适合您的用例的方法。

trans-unit.source: If you depend on using Ansible with a config file in the current working directory, the best way to avoid this problem is to restrict access to your Ansible directories to particular user(s) and/or group(s). If your Ansible directories live on a filesystem which has to emulate Unix permissions, like Vagrant or Windows Subsystem for Linux (WSL), you may, at first, not know how you can fix this as chmod, chown, and chgrp might not work there. In most of those cases, the correct fix is to modify the mount options of the filesystem so the files and directories are readable and writable by the users and groups running Ansible but closed to others. For more details on the correct settings, see:

trans-unit.target: 如果你有很多加密的文件,在启动时解密它们可能会造成明显的延迟。要加快这个速度,请安装加密包。

trans-unit.source: If you have multiple ISO disks with the same name use disk ID to specify which should be used or use storage_domain to filter disks.
trans-unit.target: If you have multiple ISO disks with the same name use disk ID to specify which should be used or use storage_domain to filter disks.

trans-unit.source: If you have read into Controlling where tasks run: delegation and local actions it may quickly become apparent that the rolling update pattern can be extended, and you can use the success or failure of the playbook run to decide whether to add a machine into a load balancer or not.
trans-unit.target: If you have read into Controlling where tasks run: delegation and local actions it may quickly become apparent that the rolling update pattern can be extended, and you can use the success or failure of the playbook run to decide whether to add a machine into a load balancer or not.

trans-unit.source: If you have read into Delegation, Rolling Updates, and Local Actions it may quickly become apparent that the rolling update pattern can be extended, and you can use the success or failure of the playbook run to decide whether to add a machine into a load balancer or not.
trans-unit.target: 如果您已经阅读了委派，滚动更新和本地操作，则可能会很快发现可以扩展滚动更新模式，并且可以使用剧本运行的成功或失败来决定是否将计算机添加到负载均衡器中或不。

trans-unit.source: If you have resources in other partitions, the partition is aws-partitionname.

trans-unit.source: If you have two or more network platforms in your environment, you can use the network agnostic modules to simplify your playbooks. You can use network agnostic modules such as ansible.netcommon.cli_command or ansible.netcommon.cli_config in place of the platform-specific modules such as arista.eos.eos_config, cisco.ios.ios_config, and junipernetworks.junos.junos_config. This reduces the number of tasks and conditionals you need in your playbooks.
trans-unit.target: If you have two or more network platforms in your environment, you can use the network agnostic modules to simplify your playbooks. You can use network agnostic modules such as ansible.netcommon.cli_command or ansible.netcommon.cli_config in place of the platform-specific modules such as arista.eos.eos_config , cisco.ios.ios_config , and junipernetworks.junos.junos_config . This reduces the number of tasks and conditionals you need in your playbooks.

trans-unit.source: If you have two or more network platforms in your environment, you can use the network agnostic modules to simplify your playbooks. You can use network agnostic modules such as cli_command or cli_config in place of the platform-specific modules such as eos_config, ios_config, and junos_config. This reduces the number of tasks and conditionals you need in your playbooks.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的环境中有两个或多个网络平台，则可以使用网络不可知模块来简化您的剧本。您可以使用诸如 cli_command 或 cli_config 之类的与网络无关的模块来代替特定于平台的模块，例如 eos_config ， ios_config 和 junos_config 。这减少了您在剧本中需要执行的任务和条件的数量。

trans-unit.source: If you increase verbosity all tasks are printed.
trans-unit.target: 如果你增加verbosity,所有的任务都会被打印出来。

trans-unit.source: If you need to manage multiple environments it’s sometimes prudent to have only hosts of a single environment defined per inventory. This way, it is harder to, for instance, accidentally change the state of nodes inside the “test” environment when you actually wanted to update some “staging” servers.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要管理多个环境，有时明智的做法是每个清单只定义一个环境的主机。这样，例如，当您实际上要更新某些“登台”服务器时，很难意外地更改“测试”环境中节点的状态。

trans-unit.source: If you need to specify a password for sudo, run ansible-playbook with --ask-become-pass or -K. If you run a playbook utilizing become and the playbook seems to hang, it’s probably stuck at the privilege escalation prompt and can be stopped using Control-C, allowing you to re-execute the playbook adding the appropriate password.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要为sudo指定密码，请使用 --ask-become-pass 或 -K 运行 ansible-playbook 。如果您使用“ become 运行剧本并且该剧本似乎挂起，则它可能停留在特权升级提示下，并且可以使用 Control-C 停止，从而允许您添加适当的密码来重新执行该剧本。

trans-unit.source: If you need to specify more than one value with the same key, use a list as value.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要指定多个具有相同键的值,请使用列表作为值。

trans-unit.source: If you need to store lists or hash data, or prefer to keep host and group specific variables separate from the inventory file, see Organizing host and group variables.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要存储列表或哈希数据，或者希望将主机和组专用变量与清单文件分开，请参阅“ 组织主机和组变量”。

trans-unit.source: If you need variable interpolation in copied files, use the ansible.builtin.template module. Using a variable in the content field will result in unpredictable output.
